errors.error_description: The license link points to `LICENSE.md`, but the standard file name for a license in a repository is typically `LICENSE` without a file extension.
correction_candidates: Change the license link from `<LICENSE.md>` to `<LICENSE>`.
Change the license link from `<LICENSE.md>` to `<LICENSE.txt>`.
Change the license link from `<LICENSE.md>` to `<COPYING>`.
Change the license link from `<LICENSE.md>` to `LICENSE`.
errors.golden_answer: Change the license link from `<LICENSE.md>` to `<LICENSE>`.
